programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: Rick and Marty Lagina make a discovery at Smith's Cove that promises to help them solve the mystery of the Money Pit.

programme.title: American Restoration
programme.desc: The team turns a petrol pump into a beer cooler and restore a sign from a 1970s fast food restaurant.

programme.title: American Restoration
programme.desc: Singer Jason Mraz asks Rick to help him restore a sign as a tribute to his late grandfather.

programme.title: American Restoration
programme.desc: Baseball stars Tommy Lasorda, Ron Cey and Paul Lo Duca challenge Rick to transform a 1950s drinks cooler into a hot dog cart.

programme.title: American Restoration
programme.desc: Rick challenges a potential new recruit to prove his worth by restoring a scooter.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike and Frank are intrigued by a mysterious locked trunk when they visit the former home of a circus, and a zebra-print motorcycle also catches their eye.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: R&R's helicopter is taken out of action by inclement weather, leaving the company with serious problems.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Helicopter logging suffers under the control of a new pilot, the underdogs finally get their big chance, and the men of Pihl Logging are given the opportunity to deal with the biggest timber of their careers.

programme.title: American Restoration
programme.desc: A collector of rare memorabilia asks for a job and the team work on restoring a sign from a 1940s petrol station.

programme.title: American Restoration
programme.desc: The crew restores an ejector seat from a 1950s jet fighter, while Brettly works on a popcorn machine.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: Events involving military and intelligence agencies, with suggestions of cover-ups relating to two unexplained incidents in the east of England in 1956 and 1980

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: Stories of UFO sightings and alien abductions, beginning with reports of multiple bright aerial lights near Tinley Park, Illinois, in 2004.

programme.title: Air Crash: Disasters Uncovered
programme.desc: Blow Out.

programme.title: Mega Disasters
programme.desc: The possibility that a wall of water on the same scale as the Indian Ocean tsunami of 2004 could strike the west coast of America, and what could be done to avert such a disaster.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike is impressed by a vintage caravan and a strange totem pole when he and Frank examine a veteran collector's hoard.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike and Frank look for old arcade games during a power cut. They also come across a collection of motorbikes, but realise they may not be for sale.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Les goes into detail about his plans for a new pawn store, and Ashley is caught in the crossfire when a fight breaks out in the middle of the floor.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: The retailers scrutinise a signature apparently made by deposed Iraqi leader Saddam Hussein, and Les loses his cool with a customer over a broken necklace. Documentary series following the daily running of a pawn shop.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Ashley comes out from behind the security glass to confront a menacing customer, and there is more trouble when a man claims he has been robbed in the shop.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Ashley is in trouble with Seth and Les, who discover she is to blame for the shop's current cash crisis.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Seth finds himself in the cross hairs after his new employee makes a big mistake, while Ashley is forced to face one of her most insulting customers yet.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: As a storm threatens to knock out the shop's power, Seth hatches an emergency plan - only for it to be shot down by his father.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders head to Torrance and compete over an unusual unit that may prove to be one of the most valuable in the series' history.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: At auctions in Bellflower, Ivy prays he can salvage something from a bad purchase. Meanwhile, Jarrod buys a unit that proves a nightmare for Brandi..

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy knows exactly what he wants at an auction in Fontana and has high hopes of getting it, while Jarrod and Brandi need to work on their tactics.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: The Thrill of a Kitty and the Agony of Smoked Meat
programme.desc: Darrell aims to prove that treasure sometimes looks like total trash, while Rene won't be content with second best.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers head to West Covina in California, where Jarrod and Brandi bring in an expert to sniff out the best lockers and Darrell and Brandon help everyone dress for success.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Mary faces stiff opposition as she tries to turn a bad day around with a great locker, as everyone is out to make big bucks at auctions in Riverside.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers hope for big things at auctions in Rancho Cucamonga. Ivy proves he has no problem splashing out, if it's the right locker.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Auctions in Costa Mesa bring out the best and worst in the buyers as they go all out to score a fortune from a great locker.

programme.title: Ronnie O'Sullivan's American Hustle
programme.desc: Ronnie O'Sullivan and Matt Smith hit the pool halls of Memphis for a rematch with Johnny Archer, one of the greatest players in pool history.

programme.title: Outback Truckers
programme.desc: History threatens to repeat itself as Steve Grahame and convoy partner Sy Howells battle to reach a remote community before the wet season leaves them stranded..

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: While the excavation of Smith's Cove continues to uncover an abundance of ancient structures, Rick, Marty and the team resume the treasure hunt.

programme.title: Alone
programme.desc: Two men remain on the island as the storm of the year blows in. The weather, isolation and starvation prove too much for one contestant in the season finale.

programme.title: Swamp People
programme.desc: When an old-timer gets into trouble with his lines, Troy answers the code of the swamp and lends him a hand.

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: Compilation looking back at highlights of past episodes of the comedy quiz hosted by Dara O Briain, with regular panellists Hugh Dennis, Andy Parsons and Chris Addison. From 2012.

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Comedians Dave Gorman and Omid Djalili, TV presenter Davina McCall and journalist Janet Street-Porter join team captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack on the comedy panel show, in which they try to dupe their opponents with plausible lies about themselves. Presented by Rob Brydon.

programme.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You
programme.sub-title: Have I Got a Bit More Old News for You
programme.desc: Actress Tracey Ullman hosts an extended edition of the satirical quiz from April 2018, with comedian James Acaster and Sky News journalist Beth Rigby joining team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton to poke fun at the week's news.

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: Lee Mack and Sally Bretton star in the domestic comedy which sees the couple appear to go from one disaster to the next, while coping with their three kids, Lucy's disapproving parents, Lee's feckless dad Frank and their world-weary friends Toby and Anna. This week the couple become addicted to a TV box set, causing them to cancel dinner with Toby and Anna at the last moment. But when they lie about the reason, it only succeeds in opening up a huge can of worms. Domestic comedy, with Hugh Dennis and Abigail Cruttenden.

programme.title: Zapped
programme.desc: Brian has found the magical amulet that can potentially send him home - but it doesn't work. Howell tricks him into getting a book from the oddly menacing Munty Library.

programme.title: Zapped
programme.desc: In the final episode, Brian joins the Munty Reserve forces, while Barbara and Steg find their own groups to enlist with.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Matt LeBlanc and Chris Harris go to Norway to test drive the latest estate cars from Porsche and Ferrari, while Rory Reid is joined by racing driver Sabine Schmitz for an unusual motoring challenge - to create Britain's newest mountain with the help of a tiny Suzuki. The team is joined in the studio by Westworld star James Marsden.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The presenters square up to their Australian counterparts in an automotive version of the Ashes, with challenges including rallying, drifting and a double-decker car race. Jeremy Clarkson also test-drives the Ferrari 599 GTO, and Boris Becker gets behind the wheel of the Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: Ultimate Movers
programme.desc: Journeys taken by the biggest cargo in Britain. Some of Scotland's finest whiskey must make a 180-mile road trip in order to end up on the supermarket shelves.

programme.title: Mega Air
programme.desc: Before lights out to start the Formula 1 season in Australia, the programme gains access behind the scenes at F1 team Haas as they pack tonnes of cars and gear for air freighting.

programme.title: Cops UK: Bodycam Squad
programme.desc: An officer is assaulted by a man he is trying to take into custody for beating his partner.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: The former wrestler challenges eight contestants to triumph over a series of gruelling physical endurance tests.

programme.title: Ultimate Movers
programme.sub-title: Messenger Statue, Steam Fair, Lego Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The team at King's Haulage deal with the UK's largest bronze sculpture when it berths at Plymouth Docks, while the race is on to deliver a herd of Lego dinosaurs to Marwell Zoo.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: The guys pick the collection of a reclusive and mysterious businessman named 'the Colonel', who has gone to great lengths to keep his identity secret.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: The guys go hog wild at a sprawling ranch in Texas, where Mike flips for a VW bus that has been transformed into a hunting lodge on wheels.

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Comedians Dave Gorman and Omid Djalili, TV presenter Davina McCall and journalist Janet Street-Porter join team captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack on the comedy panel show, in which they try to dupe their opponents with plausible lies about themselves. Presented by Rob Brydon.

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Olympic cycling gold-medallist Chris Hoy, impressionist Ronni Ancona, writer and producer Danny Wallace and sports presenter Gabby Logan join team captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack on the comedy panel show, in which they try to dupe their opponents with plausible lies about themselves. Hosted by Rob Brydon.

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Fashionista Trinny Woodall, actor Reece Shearsmith, West End star Michael Ball and critic Charlie Brooker join team captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack on the comedy panel show, in which they try to dupe their opponents with plausible lies about themselves. Hosted by Rob Brydon.

programme.title: Eddie Eats America
programme.desc: In Austin, Eddie Hall takes on Superbike legend Colin 'Texas Tornado' Edwards in a strength vs speed race - and sets his own eating challenge from eight of the city's food trucks.

programme.title: Eddie Eats America
programme.desc: In Manhattan, Eddie Hall goes head to head with long-time rival Brian Shaw, pulling a 23-tonne truck - and attempting the notorious skyscraper 'Monster' sandwich from Sarge's Deli.

programme.title: Cops UK: Bodycam Squad
programme.desc: Keith gets lost on the roads of Derbyshire looking for a wanted man. He spots a dodgy van driver who is on the road without insurance, and is forced to make a crucial decision.

programme.title: QI XL
programme.desc: Extended edition. Sarah Millican, Jason Manford and Bill Bailey join regular panellist Alan Davies on the comedy quiz. Host Stephen Fry asks a range of fiendish questions on the topic of keeps, with points being awarded for interesting answers as well as correct ones.

programme.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You
programme.sub-title: Have I Got a Bit More Old News for You
programme.desc: Actress Tracey Ullman hosts an extended edition of the satirical quiz from April 2018, with comedian James Acaster and Sky News journalist Beth Rigby joining team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton to poke fun at the week's news.

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: Rob Beckett, Milton Jones, Ellie Taylor and Josh Widdicombe join regular panellists Hugh Dennis and Andy Parsons to give their irreverent takes on the biggest stories to hit the headlines, through stand-up spots and improvised games. Chaired by Dara O Briain. From 2015.

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Devious Greg Davies tries to spot our five camouflaged comics, before the gang attempt to herd some dogs and chickens.

programme.title: Room 101
programme.desc: Mrs Brown star Brendan O'Carroll, comedian Bob Mortimer and Countdown numbers expert Rachel Riley tell Frank Skinner what really gets on their wick, in the hope he will banish their bugbears to the infamous room for ever. Their gripes include urinal etiquette, food with bacon wrapped round it and the Essex girl stereotype.

programme.title: Steam Train Britain
programme.desc: Great Central Railway's Scott Manley takes a rainy busman's holiday working as a guard at Bury, while a team of volunteers in Wales try to keep the line clear of overgrown plants.

programme.title: Underground Worlds
programme.desc: Exploring the military headquarters built beneath Dover Castle during the Second World War and Odessa's catacombs, possibly the largest tunnel network in the world.

programme.title: Find My Past
programme.desc: The relatives of a wireless operator, a passenger and a steward discover how their ancestors' lives intertwined on board the ill-fated Titanic in 1912. Presented by Chris Hollins.

programme.title: Find My Past
programme.desc: Chris Hollins invites three people, including the nephew and grandson of two RAF pilots, learn about the role their forebears played in the Battle of Britain.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Find My Past
programme.desc: Descendants of three key players in the mutiny on the Bounty in 1789 - John Fryer, Fletcher Christian and William Bligh - learn the exact roles their seafaring ancestors played in the event. Presented by Chris Hollins.

programme.title: Find My Past
programme.desc: The families of three men hear the stories of their relatives' roles in the D-Day landings of June 1944 in Normandy.

programme.title: Inside Hitler's Killing Machine
programme.desc: Documentary about the Holocaust and some of the key figures involved, beginning with Hjalmar Schacht, who was never a Nazi but played a vital role in Hitler's plans.

programme.title: Inside Hitler's Killing Machine
programme.desc: The story of the Ahnenerbe research institute, which was set up to provide scientific backing to Hitler's ideology, through a series of horrific experiments.

programme.title: Inside Hitler's Killing Machine
programme.desc: The establishment of the concentration camps, revealing how quickly a system of concentration populations turned into a tool for mass murder.

programme.title: Hunting Down the Nazis
programme.desc: Part one of two. Documentary about Simon Wiesenthal, a survivor of the Holocaust who dedicated his life to tracking down Nazi war criminals who had escaped justice.

programme.title: Hunting Down the Nazis
programme.desc: Part two of two. Documentary about Simon Wiesenthal, a survivor of the Holocaust who dedicated his life to tracking down Nazi war criminals who had escaped justice.

programme.title: Murder Maps
programme.desc: Nicholas Day recreates the case of a soldier who returned from the front line of the Second World War with a terrible urge to kill.

programme.title: Murder Maps
programme.sub-title: John Christie: Serial Killer - Part One
programme.desc: The first of two programmes looking at the case of John Christie, who murdered at least eight women, including his own wife.

programme.title: Murder Maps
programme.sub-title: John Christie: Serial Killer - Part Two
programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part profile of John Christie, looking at how his crimes were blamed on an innocent man, who was sentenced to death.

programme.title: Murder Maps
programme.desc: Nicholas Day recreates the case of a soldier who returned from the front line of the Second World War with a terrible urge to kill.

programme.title: Murder Maps
programme.sub-title: John Christie: Serial Killer - Part One
programme.desc: The first of two programmes looking at the case of John Christie, who murdered at least eight women, including his own wife.

programme.title: Murder Maps
programme.sub-title: John Christie: Serial Killer - Part Two
programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part profile of John Christie, looking at how his crimes were blamed on an innocent man, who was sentenced to death.

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: A settlement in Argentina destroyed by floods, a town in the US that has been erased, and a Soviet dream-town that turned into a nuclear nightmare.

programme.title: 'Allo 'Allo!
programme.desc: General Von Klinkerhoffen orders Edith to marry Captain Bertorelli as a propaganda exercise, while the resistance tries to rescue the airmen who are trapped in wine barrels in the chateau's cellar. Wartime comedy, starring Gorden Kaye, Carmen Silvera and Vicki Michelle.

programme.title: 'Allo 'Allo!
programme.desc: The British airmen get stuck down the drain in the village square, and Rene plans to rescue them using an old ice-cream van. As a result, General Von Klinkerhoffen gets more than he bargained for when he decides to buy one of the cool refreshments on sale. Wartime comedy, starring Gorden Kaye.

programme.title: 'Allo 'Allo!
programme.desc: Michelle's cunning plan to release the airmen from the drain in the square is ruined when the gypsy fair is cancelled. Second World War comedy, starring Gorden Kaye and Kirsten Cooke.

programme.title: Queen Elizabeth's Secret Agents
programme.desc: Documentary featuring dramatic reconstructions and interviews with historians to examine the network of spymasters and secret agents that helped protect Elizabeth I from assassination, terror and treason for more than 40 years. The first edition reveals how the pope's declaration of Elizabeth as a heretic 12 years into her reign set England's Catholics against her, leading the queen to charge William Cecil with the task of stopping assassins getting through, and the huge espionage network he established saw his spies break Catholic conspiracies at home and abroad.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.desc: One of the largest Nazi bunkers ever constructed, outside the French town of Watten, a missile facility with storage for 108 missiles, a liquid oxygen factory and two launch pads.

programme.title: The Heart Guy
programme.desc: April is pregnant, and not everyone is as supportive as Matt had hoped, but the netball game between the hospital and mining company takes all the focus.

programme.title: Gregory's Girl (1981)
programme.desc: A gawky teenager is dismayed to be relegated to goalkeeper in the school football team - but his thoughts turn to romance once he meets the female striker who takes his place. However, his awkward nature proves an obstacle to winning her over, despite the sage advice of his worldly-wise little sister. Comedy, starring John Gordon Sinclair, Dee Hepburn, Jake D'Arcy, Clare Grogan and Robert Buchanan.

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: Sarah leads the charge to rescue James, whose ordeal continues when his sexuality becomes known, and puts her relationship with George at risk when a disturbing discovery forces her to reveal her darkest secret.

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: Sarah reveals her horrific secret to George, and their relationship is suddenly thrown into doubt. The Christmas soiree brings out Jack's intimacy issues, and Anna publicly humiliates Andrew. Romantic drama, starring Marta Dusseldorp.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Soldier, Soldier
programme.desc: The officers carry out a series of exercises in evacuating casualties from a combat zone, which leaves them convinced they are about to be sent on active duty.

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Part one of two. Gabriel once again steps outside the bounds of the law, unleashing his gang of thugs on two youths who have been tormenting an elderly lady, but the unexpected return of an old ally could mean his days as a vigilante are numbered. Meanwhile, Sam turns to a police profiler for help in tracking down the Sun Hill serial rapist, Sheelagh finds herself accused of racism, and a race to save two children from drowning has a profound effect on Honey and Cameron.

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Part two of two. Already haunted by Kerry's rape, Cameron is plunged into further emotional torment after failing to save the two drowning children. Sam's hunt for the Sun Hill rapist is jeopardised by a witness's suicide attempt and alarm bells ring for Ken when he spies the matriarch of a notorious criminal clan thought to have been in exile abroad. Guest starring Lynda Bellingham.

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Recovering alcoholic Jim finds himself battling an addiction of a different sort as he gets bitten by the gambling bug, and there's a big surprise in store for Phil.

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Kerry reveals a ruthless streak as she confronts Cameron over his liaison with Honey, then storms off for a showdown with Gabriel, determined to make him pay for raping her. PC Steve Hunter's debut at Sun Hill gets off to a bad start when he antagonises his brother Phil, and tragedy strikes as June is run over by Tony when he pursues the driver of a stolen vehicle.

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: Cheryl and Dick welcome their adopted son Oscar home for the first time, and Peggy and Lucy fight for their lives after a runaway horse causes a horrific road accident.

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: A glamorous blonde turns up in Skelthwaite to see an old friend, only to find the town in mourning for Peggy, and another new arrival causes a farming family to celebrate. Starring Lesley Dunlop, Leslie Ash and Tony Haygarth.

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: An archaeologist posing as Rosemary dies mysteriously during a dig for Anglo-Saxon artefacts in the grounds of Lord Engleton's stately home, presenting the duo with a fresh mystery to solve. The gardens are unaccountably blighted by yellowing, forcing the estate to close its gates to the public, and a second death suggests somebody will go to any lengths for a piece of British history. Guest starring Julian Wadham.

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: The unexplained death of a newborn baby delivered by Cynthia puts the midwife under intense scrutiny from the police and the pregnant women of Poplar, placing immense strain on her work and health as she questions her own abilities. Chummy faces pressure of a different kind as she and PC Noakes pursue a dream which could bring exciting changes for the couple, while a chance encounter returns Jimmy to Jenny's life - with surprising results. Bryony Hannah, Miranda Hart and Jessica Raine star.

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Jenny is seconded to a short-staffed hospital in London, but grows increasingly reluctant to carry out her duties when she finds out she is working under intimidating surgeon Mr Tracey. Back in Poplar, the midwives are introduced to newcomer Jane and outspoken twins Meg and Mave Carter. The sisters are identical in every way, except one of them is now pregnant - forcing them to come to terms with the impact a baby will have on them. Jessica Raine and Bryony Hannah star.

programme.title: Miss Marple
programme.sub-title: The Mirror Crack'd from Side to Side
programme.desc: A film star arrives from America and throws a summer garden party for the entire village of St Mary Mead - where one of her fans drinks a poisoned cocktail and promptly drops dead. Fortunately, the guest list includes Miss Marple, who immediately sets about tracking down the killer. Feature-length drama, starring Joan Hickson, Claire Bloom and Barry Newman.

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Sister Julienne oversees the opening of a family planning clinic at the local community centre, leading mother-of-three Wilma Goddens to start taking the contraceptive pill behind her husband's back. Barbara is distraught when she discovers that her father has accepted a missionary posting in New Guinea for the next three years so will not be able to officiate at her wedding, while Violet suffers terribly with hot flushes, Christopher asks Trixie to meet his daughter, and Delia's heartache may finally be over.

programme.title: Wallander
programme.desc: The detective investigates when a body is found half-buried in a swamp. Visiting her home, Wallander discovers signs of an intruder and that the dead woman's daughter is missing. The return of a lost love distracts him from the case at hand, as he encounters a gang of bikers that have been causing trouble in the area and begins to suspect he is being watched.

programme.title: Waking the Dead
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. The team is called in to investigate when a convicted killer is cleared of the murder of his adoptive father on appeal. Not fully convinced the man is innocent, Boyd tries to find the rest of the family to establish the truth, but when he does eventually track the relatives down, he realises they have a lot to hide. Drama, starring Trevor Eve, Sue Johnston and Claire Goose.

programme.title: You've Been Framed!
programme.desc: Harry Hill narrates a comical selection of mishaps filmed by viewers, featuring cats and their killer claws, makeshift dance floors and testing Newton's Laws.

programme.title: Tenable
programme.desc: Five friends from Newcastle answer questions about top 10 lists from the realms of pop culture and general knowledge, then try to score a perfect 10 in the final round to take home the prize money. Quiz, hosted by Warwick Davis.

programme.title: ITV Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.

programme.title: Super 4
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure series featuring a gang of heroes who protect the city of Technopolis and its King Kenric against evil elements.

programme.title: Thunderbirds Are Go
programme.desc: The Mechanic finally completes Project Sentinel, and aims to test its destructive capabilities by making The Hood his first target. As the International Rescue team scrambles to save an old foe, Brains embarks on a dangerous mission to neutralise the Mechanic once and for all.

programme.title: Dare Master
programme.desc: Can Danny handle the pressure of performing basketball tricks in front of hundreds of fans and avoid the messy forfeit?.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The hapless bumbler attempts to make his own home movie, a horror thriller with Mrs Wicket in the starring role. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The hapless bumbler has to look after Mrs Wicket's goldfish, but Scrapper the cat is keen to help. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr Magoo
programme.desc: Magoo thinks he's a beach lifeguard but is actually on an ice floe and the swimmers are penguins..

programme.title: Mr Magoo
programme.desc: Magoo's going to miss his flight. Unfortunately, he's not at the airport, but the supermarket, where Fizz and Weasel are hatching their latest plan..

programme.title: Mr Magoo
programme.sub-title: The Prophecy of the Goldensand'S Dragon
programme.desc: Fizz is at the beach building a sandcastle. Magoo thinks they are preparing to thwart an attack by an enemy riding a dragon..

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Monsters and ghouls get in the way of the Scooby gang's adventures as they travel and spend time together in the summer.

programme.title: Robozuna
programme.desc: Children's sci-fi fantasy series about 14-year-old orphan Ariston and his robot Mangle, fighting an evil empire together.

programme.title: Spy School
programme.desc: The budding spies are called into action against Goldfist at Chelsea Football Club, and uncover a plot with Eden Hazard himself.

programme.title: Beautiful Baking with Juliet Sear
programme.desc: Juliet serves up a selection of bakes that involve spices. She makes spiced pumpkin pie with a meringue topping, chocolate and chilli cookies and winter pavlova with spiced apples and pears. She also visits a Lebanese bakery and is joined by food and travel writer John Gregory-Smith, who makes date and cinnamon squares.

programme.title: John and Lisa's Weekend Kitchen
programme.desc: John Torode and Lisa Faulkner are starting to feel festive with a few winter warmers. Lisa begins with a blue cheese and butternut squash pie, followed by John's sausage casserole. They also serve a family favourite - macaroni cheese, with a twist - and for dessert it's a classic ginger cake served two ways.

programme.title: Nadia's Family Feasts
programme.desc: Nadia Sawalha is joined by Asimakis Chaniotis, London's youngest Michelin-starred chef, to create a family feast from Greece. The menu starts with scrambled eggs for breakfast and chicken gyros for lunch. Then Asimakis rustles up his mum's meatball soup for dinner before Nadia makes Greek almond crescent biscuits for dessert.

programme.title: How to Spend It Well at Christmas with Phillip Schofield
programme.desc: Phillip Schofield returns to put more Christmas gifts to the test, aided by his wife Steph, celebrity guests and members of the public. They begin by gearing up for Black Friday with tips on the best gifts and gadgets on the market. With sales of personal electric vehicles on the up, Corrie trio Jack AP Shepherd (David), Alan Halsall (Tyrone) and Colson Smith (Craig) put hoverboards and scooters to the test. Clare Balding is on a mission to find the pefect present for pets and Eddie 'the Eagle' Edwards ranks gift experiences such as track racing, skydiving and flyboarding.

programme.title: The X Factor: Celebrity
programme.desc: Dermot O'Leary hosts the climax of the star-studded spin-off from the long-running singing contest. Over the past seven weeks, the line-up of famous faces has been whittled down to today's finalists, all under the watchful mentoring of judging panel Simon Cowell, Nicole Scherzinger and Louis Walsh. In this grand final, they will perform to impress both the viewing public and the judges, with the most popular act being crowned as the first celebrity series champion and securing a recording contract.

programme.title: Back to Mine
programme.desc: Globetrotting Emma is house hunting for love with the help of her cousin Kelly - and she has a substantial list of demands to be met as she visits three single men's homes. In the running is a rugby player, a trendy musician and a bodybuilder. Which one will she choose to go back to her house for a date?.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 (2011)
programme.desc: The teenage wizard continues his search for the artefacts containing fragments of the dark lord Voldemort's soul. Time is running out, as the evil sorcerer is aware of Harry's mission, and marshals his forces for a final, devastating attack on Harry and his friends at Hogwarts school. Conclusion of the fantasy saga, with Daniel Radcliffe, Ralph Fiennes, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson and Alan Rickman.

programme.title: The ITV Election Debate
programme.desc: Julie Etchingham hosts a debate to which seven parties in the General Election campaign have been invited, ahead of the poll on December 12. The parties are the Conservatives, Labour, the Liberal Democrats, the SNP, the Brexit Party, the Greens and Plaid Cymru. Brexit is likely to be high on the agenda for this debate, along with issues including the NHS, crime, education and climate change.

programme.title: I'm a Celebrity Get Me Out of Here!
programme.desc: As the campmates face being booted out of the jungle back into their life of luxury, who is ready to make that jump and who wants to stay another day? Presented by Ant and Dec.

programme.title: Holiday Horrors: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Jamie Theakston narrates a selection of clips submitted by members of the public, which display in cringe-worthy detail some of the many things that can go wrong while away on holiday. A walk in the woods becomes a fight for survival, a man from Wales becomes a shark-wrestler, and an unfortunate holiday-maker ruins all his once-in-a-lifetime holiday snaps.

programme.title: Police, Camera, Auction
programme.desc: An insight into the auctions where criminals' assets from their nefarious activities are sold at auction, with the proceeds usually going to help those whose lives have been blighted by crime. From sports cars and designer goods to outrageous bling and strange collectibles, cameras reveal the broad range of criminals' possessions seized by specialist police teams and put under the hammer.The auctioneers and police discuss their work, while those victims who will benefit from the money wait anxiously to see the outcome of the sales.

programme.title: Destroyed in Seconds
programme.desc: A tornado causes destruction in Kansas and a freak accident catapults a racer into the path of a speeding boat. Presented by Ron Pitts.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith and Jason Plato try to find a decent new car for just 10,000. Vicki Butler-Henderson checks out the new Lamborghini Urus, and the team finds the biggest BMW ever made, the new X7.

programme.title: Overhaulin'
programme.desc: Chip Foose and the A-Team restore a newly retired teacher's 1954 pickup truck that he has put off investing in until his twin daughters' college tuition has been paid for.

programme.title: Pacific Warriors
programme.desc: The season draws to a close, and Jon Jon is finally tested by a monster fish, Isaac gets creative, and Boogie is caught in a life-or-death struggle.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien come across a water trough and a cartwheel as they continue their mission to turn unwanted items into hard cash.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters - Best Buys

programme.title: EFL on Quest
programme.desc: Colin Murray presents a round-up of goals and highlights from the English Football League.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Bitesize
programme.desc: In Lincolnshire, Drew Pritchard falls for a wrought iron club fender. He sniffs out a bargain at Chester Zoo and at a stately home in Leicestershire, finds a piece of royal history.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: Bill Carlton and his team customise a F350 with less than 600 miles on it, lowering it with a handmade air-ride and adding a one-of-a-kind hitch.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike Brewer takes a risk on a classic Jaguar E-type in poor condition, but quickly discovers the expense of buying parts as Edd China gets to work.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike Brewer purchases a Mini Moke, which was designed as an off-road military vehicle, for expert mechanic Edd China to work on - before trying to sell it for a profit.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Experts Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien travel Britain to find, fix and flog unwanted possessions on behalf of their owners, turning items into hard cash. A butter churn, a slot machine and a set of print trays are among the finds in this edition.

programme.title: Swimming with Monsters with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: The naturalist travels to the Pantanal wetland area of Brazil to swim with and study the anacondas that inhabit the region - but his presence in the water could trigger an attack.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: The team restores two Royal Worcester vases that are precious family heirlooms, along with a Cirencester village clock and a 19th-century hay press.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: The team works to restore a clapping monkey toy, an ornate Victorian travelling treasure box, and an iconic 1950s Wurlitzer jukebox.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain
programme.desc: The interventions of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Spain, whose staff are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith and Jason Plato try to find a decent new car for just 10,000. Vicki Butler-Henderson checks out the new Lamborghini Urus, and the team finds the biggest BMW ever made, the new X7.

programme.title: Dahmer on Dahmer: A Serial Killer Speaks
programme.desc: Part one of two. Journalist Nancy Glass investigates the crimes of American serial killer and sex offender Jeffery Dahmer, who committed the rape, murder, and dismemberment of 17 men and boys from 1978 to 1991.

programme.title: Dahmer on Dahmer: A Serial Killer Speaks
programme.desc: Nancy Glass investigates one of history's most terrifying cases, 25 years on from Jeffrey Dahmer confessing to 17 gruesome murders that shook America to its core.

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: The case of Louisiana student Mickey Shunick, who went missing after a night out in May 2012. Police failed to make a breakthrough until they spoted her on surveillance footage. Eventually a registered sex offender pleaded guilty to killing the 21-year-old, and also being responsible for the death of another woman whose body had been found in September 1999.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: How the double homicide of a young mother and her baby daughter sent Galax's tiny police force on a frenzied mission to stop unspeakable evil in its tracks.

programme.title: FBI Files
programme.desc: The agents face a difficult challenge in the form of a band of political extremists that has pulled off two major bank robberies with precision.

programme.title: Animal Cops Phoenix
programme.desc: A police officer spots a pony wandering along the motorway, and the team tries to locate its owner.

programme.title: Bondi Vet
programme.desc: Chris Brown and Lisa Chimes head out to the Blue Mountains after some of the most intense bushfires on record, to help pets and wildlife in the fire zone.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Injured army vet Shealynn is treated to a surprise when comedian Seth Meyers turns up, while model Ashley wants a slinky dress that also gets the approval of her father.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Krystle shares the spotlight with her mother, Afrodite argues with her mum over fashion and Lindsey wants hers to attend the fitting.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: The rules of friendship are tested when best friend brides Jenaya and Terinni both fall in love with the same wedding dress. In for their fittings, brides Lex and Amy insist on keeping their final gown reveals a secret from each other until their big day.

programme.title: Bondi Vet
programme.desc: Dr Chris Brown meets Monty, the kid goat that cannot stop scratching, and Lisa treats a terrified German shepherd puppy. A feisty 42-year-old galah has an unappetising problem.

programme.title: Bondi Vet
programme.desc: Dr Chris Brown treats Tigger the dog, who was hit by a car, Tim Faulkner makes a surprise discovery in one family's walls and a young boxer dog is struggling to walk.

programme.title: My 600lb Life
programme.desc: A mother is forced to change her own lifestyle as well as that of her 26-year-old son Sean, who weighs over 700 pounds.

programme.title: My 600lb Life: Where Are They Now?
programme.desc: When Steven's dysfunction escalates, a risky decision is made to save his life. Meanwhile, his brother Justin heads to Houston to finally accept help..

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Behaviourist Jackson Galaxy deals with a cat that behaves strangely around its stuffed animal, and another that viciously attacks a gentle, senior feline.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: All brides have a tight budget, forcing some to haggle for even more bang for their buck. It remains to be seen whether everyone will be able to secure their dream dress.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Consultant Sarah becomes engaged and looks for a dress of her own, while Sola searches for a gown that will reflect her culture.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Carmel is assigned to help a bride-to-be who is preparing a military wedding, but Randy steps in instead. Plus, a client searches for a dress to renew her vows in.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Leah, a former model, is assigned to consultant Dianne, who is challenged by her opinionated maid-of-honour.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Debbie and Carmel team up to sell dresses to sister brides, but one of them would rather work alone.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: A woman who lost her mother to breast cancer battles her opinionated aunt, while Ellen falls for a dress that might be beyond her means.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Julie and her mother cannot hold back when it comes to their brutal opinions, while brides-to-be Joy and Beth have high expectations.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: A woman returns a ballroom-style dress so that she can buy one that better suits her edgy tastes.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Carmel desperately needs a sale to hit her monthly goal, while Keasha works with bride-to-be Heidi who recently donated a kidney to her fiance.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Bre is set on a traditional gown, while Jennifer knows the exact dress for her. Elsewhere, Susan finally gets to make her dream wedding a reality after a 20-year wait.

programme.title: Long Island Medium
programme.sub-title: On the Road: Las Vegas - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. Theresa Caputo surprises fans wth readings in Las Vegas - and makes it a family affair by bringing along her loved ones, who take in the best that Vegas has to offer.

programme.title: Crikey! It's the Irwins
programme.desc: Robert follows in his father's steps wrangling Utah, a highly venomous king cobra. A vet from the zoo's hospital, Dr Amber, visits Tandora to care for wild koalas.

programme.title: Long Lost Family US
programme.desc: Chris Jacobs unwraps the mystery of a woman's origins, which began with her abandonment at a Korean orphanage. Lisa Joyner helps a woman forced to place her baby for adoption.

programme.title: British Police: Our Toughest Cases
programme.desc: In the 1980s and '90s, there were around 200 murders and attacks on sex workers across the Midlands. Stafford man Alun Kyte was later found to be responsible.

programme.title: The Killer in My Family
programme.desc: Relatives of Steve Wright, the so-called Suffolk Strangler, reveal how his shocking crimes impacted the family. Were there any signs of his murderous intentions?.

programme.title: Embarrassing Fat Bodies
programme.desc: Doctors Christian Jessen, Dawn Harper and Pixie McKenna offer medical advice to people who are or have been overweight to help solve issues caused by their shape. In the first programme, the team helps a man whose stomach touches the floor and a woman whose successful slimming has resulted in excess skin.
